name: Saving Bunnies - Rescue Mission
description:
Planet Rabuny is being destroyed by a massive volcano! Help save as many bunny rabbits as possible with two super bounce rafts. Bounce the bunnies across the rapid river to the spaceship to escape. Collect useful power-ups to help save bunnies and avoid dangerous items that damage your rafts. Use skill to move the bounce rafts by yourself with two fingers or with help from a friend.

√ Frantic awesome fun

√ Sharp colorful graphics

√ Realistic sound effects

√ Innovative unique gameplay

√ Simple, smooth controls

√ Awesome power-ups

√ Two challenging game modes

√ Gamecenter leaderboards

√ Personal high scores

√ Single player or 2 player co-op


8-Bit Avrin Apps
